resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81440</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81440</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4368</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Molly's Supper</string>
            <string language="es">La cena de Molly</string>
            <string language="ga">Molly's Supper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abendessen Des Mollys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Dîner du Molly's</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Supper Do Molly</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Supper Del Molly</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βραδυνό Molly</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Young children are provided with a context within which they can discuss, describe, construct and draw a route which becomes real to them through following the adventures of Molly, the cat, as she rushes home in the evening.</string>
            <string language="es">Se les da a los niños pequeños un contexto en el que puedan discutir, describir, crear y dibujar una ruta, que se convierte en real para ellos, siguiendo las aventuras de Molly, la gata, cuando vuelve a casa apresurada por la noche.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tugtar comhthéacs do leanaí óga inar féidir leo bealach a phlé, cur síos a dhéanamh air, é a thógáil agus a tharraingt agus bíonn sé fíor in an-intinn trí eachtraí Molly, an cat, a leanúint agus í ag déanamh a bealach abhaile.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Junge Kinder werden mit einem Kontext versehen, 
innerhalb dessen sie einen Weg, der zu ihnen durch das Folgen der 
Abenteuer von Molly, die Katze behandeln, beschreiben, real wird 
konstruieren und zeichnen können, da sie nach Hause am Abend hetzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des enfants en bas âge sont équipés de contexte
dans lequel ils peuvent discuter, décrire, construire et dessiner un 
itinéraire qui devient vrai à eux en suivant les aventures du molly,
le chat, car elle se précipite à la maison en soirée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças novas são fornecidas com um contexto
dentro de que podem discutir, descrever, construir e desenhar uma rota
que se torne real a ele com seguir as aventuras do molly, o gato, 
porque se apressa para casa na noite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini in giovane età sono forniti di un 
contesto all'interno di cui possono discutere, descrivere, costruire 
ed estrarre un itinerario che diventa reale a loro through quanto 
segue le avventure del molly, il gatto, poichè scorre veloce a casa 
nella sera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στα μικρά παιδιά παρέχεται ένα πλαίσιο μέσα στο 
οποίο μπορούν να συζητήσουν, να περιγράψουν, να κατασκευάσουν και
να σύρουν μια διαδρομή που γίνεται πραγματική σε τα κατευθείαν 
μετά από τις περιπέτειες Molly, η γάτα, καθώς ορμά κατ' 
οίκον το βράδυ.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
